resources.string: Take control of your health journey with the right tools at your fingertips.
Get the value of your data
Move, rest, recharge and Repeat every day.
There was an error with the network, try again.
The server failed to process your request, try again.
This link does not have the required permissions.
This data source is already connected, refreshing…
This data source can only be disconnected from it\'s web page.
Try again and grant the required permissions.
Since you have previously denied some permissions you need to go to ROOK settings to grant them again.
Use the built in steps sensor of your device to synchronize your daily steps count
ROOK needs the following permissions to continue:
Access to at least one data type is required.
Background data access and at least one data type are required.
Read access to one or more data types
Use Health Connect to synchronize your health data
ROOK needs the following permissions to continue:
ROOK runs in the background to always keep your data up to date, Health Connect restricts background access unless the user gives it\'s permission.
After you give access to all the data types of your choice a second screen will be displayed, click on \'Allow\' to grant background access.
If you previously denied permissions, you can give access in Health Connect Settings by going to App Permissions → ROOK → Additional Access → Turn on \'Access data in the background\'.

Your version of Health Connect can\'t share data with our app in the background right now. Try updating the Health Connect app or your phone (system updates); if that doesn\'t help, background sharing may not be available on your device."
Health Connect is not supported by your device.
Health Connect is not installed. Please download it from the Play Store.
If you previously denied permissions, you can give access by going to Health Connect Settings → App Permissions → ROOK.
Access to at least one data type is required.
Use Samsung Health to synchronize your health data
ROOK needs the following permissions to continue:
Could not connect with Samsung Health.
Samsung Health is not installed. Please download it from the Play Store.
Your current version of Samsung Health is not supported. Please updated it to the latest version.
Your Samsung Health installation is disabled, please enable it and try again.
It seems that you haven\'t completed the onboarding process. Please complete it and try again.
